title: Hair - Original broadway cast 1968 RCA Victor release
description:
By: dantao

Channels:	Stereo
Sample rate:	44.1 kHz
Bits per sample:16
Format:	        FLAC

Title:		Hair - The American Tribal Love-Rock Musical
Released:	1968
Recorded:	May 6, 1968 on Broadway at the Biltmore Theatre
Genre:		Pop rock, psychedelic rock, funk, R&B
Artist:		Broadway Cast
Label:		RCA Victor


Hair, The American Tribal Love Rock Musical

RCA Victor Dynagroove, LSO-1150 STEREO, issued 1968.

Ripped from the original vinyl. Included images of the album jacket and the vinyl center labels. 

I listened to a 1988 CD reissue on BMG [Catalog # 1150-2-RC], and it sounded too different to me.
There were added songs, and one song out of sequence. 

I want as close to the same experience, on a computer or CD, that I had when I listened to this album on vinyl, over and over, in 1970 when I was 15 years old.
To me, these ripped tracks sound superior to the re-mastered CD I heard, and the pops and the warmth of the sound of vinyl are priceless.

To listen like a vinyl album, load all the Side 1 tracks and play, then get out of your seat, and like turning over the album back in the day, load the Side 2 tracks and cool out.
(Alternately, play in Winamp, load up Milkdrop, and trip out)

When you burn to CD, select Ã¬no pause between tracksÃ® for the total vinyl experience.

Ripped from the original 1968 vinyl to FLAC. 
(Stanton STR8-30 Direct Drive Turntable, Onkyo TX-8011 Stereo Receiver, M-Audio MobilePre USB, Nero WaveEditor, no filters used)

S1-T01 Aquarius.flac
S1-T02-03 Donna/Hashish.flac
S1-T04 Sodomy.flac
S1-T05 Colored Spade.flac
S1-T06 Manchester England.flac
S1-T07-08 I'm Black/Ain't Got No.flac
S1-T09 Air.flac
S1-T10 Initials.flac
S1-T11 I Got Life.flac
S1-T12 Hair.flac
S1-T13 My Conviction.flac
S1-T14 Don't Put It Down.flac
S1-T15 Frank Mills.flac
S1-T16 Be-In.flac
S2-T01 Where Do I Go.flac
S2-T02 Black Boys.flac
S2-T03 White

Enjoy!
